interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Roots Naturelle Curly Hair Products Bouncy Curls (8 Ounce). Moisturizing Anti-frizz Cream for Natural Hair
Review Date: 2017/09/30
Store: The Roots Naturelle
Product Description: ['Ultra Rich hydrating cream made specifically to create the spring in your curls that only nature can create. Olive and grape seed oils infuse moisture while our proteins strengthen and protect your tresses from frizz. Whether you have kinky, curly, afro or wavy curls, Bouncy curls will deliver the soft touchable curls you’ve always wanted. Directions: Perfect for daily styling. Apply to towel-dried hair. Massage in from root to tip saturating strands. Style as desired, allowing hair to dry naturally. Ingredients include: Panthenol (Pro-vitamin B5), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat Germ Oil), Olea Europea (Olive oil), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Cocos nucifera (Coconut Oil), Fragrance.']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Dry, Curly', 'Scent': 'Grape, Coconut', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Brand': 'The Roots Naturelle', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 3 inches; 9.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168040991 850605005562', 'Manufacturer': 'The Roots Naturelle'}
Review Text: I will be purchasing more. I bought this for my grandson and it makes his curls nice and moist
Review Title: I bought this for my grandson and it makes his curls nice and moist
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Interest**: Primarily focused on beauty and cosmetics accessories, especially items for eyelash extensions, but has recently expanded to include hair care products, particularly those tailored for curly hair. Also has a growing interest in makeup organization solutions.
- **Quality Conscious**: Values functionality and durability in products across all categories. Recent positive experiences with various beauty accessories and hair care items emphasize a heightened appreciation for quality.
- **Satisfaction Improvement**: Although the user typically rates products around average, they recently gave a high rating to a hair product that effectively enhanced the quality of curls, indicating an openness to endorsing products that meet their performance expectations.
- **Preference for Value**: Continues to prioritize a balance between cost and quality, appreciating items that provide practical benefits and enhance their beauty and hair routine. The user values aesthetics and usability in all their beauty purchases.
- **Review Style**: Provides straightforward, analytical feedback focused on product performance. The recent review praised a hair care product for its moisture retention, showcasing their appreciation for effective solutions while highlighting the benefits for family use.
- **Purchasing Behavior**: Demonstrates loyalty through repeat purchases and actively seeks products that improve efficiency and performance in both beauty and hair care routines, including organizational tools.

Overall, the user is evolving their beauty and hair care preferences, underscoring a broader appreciation for reliable, effective products that enhance their self-care regimen.
